original_text: And the priest that maketh him clean shall present the man that is to be made clean, and those things, before the Lord, at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation:
korean_text: 정결하게 하는 제사장은 정결함을 받을 자와 그 물건들을 회막 문 여호와 앞에 두고

sentences.original_text: And the priest that maketh him clean
shall present the man that is to be made clean
at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
